title: How much money does Taylor Swift give away? - Quora

response.answer_text: sooooo much. one time she gave away 1989 dollars to a fan to help her pay for student loans. some of her singles’ earnings all go to charity. she visits fans who are sick and gives them free tickets or merch. once she donated about 15000 dollars to a kid in need of a service dog. she wrote an entire song that she performed on the Stand Up to Cancer telethon thing that was about a child with cancer. all of it. donated

Thanks for asking. I don't follow Taylor Swift; in fact I know nothing about her as a person. I only know she has been a successful singer with a large following but her song stylings don't interest me so I don't do any other research on her one way or another. I'm sorry I can't offer any real information to you on this topic but again, thanks for asking.
